arts.ttl: Arsenal dealt double blow ahead of Brighton clash
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has confirmed that both William Saliba and Gabriel Martinelli have been ruled out of the Brighton game through injury. The sides face off at the Emirates Stadium on Wednesday for a place in the quarter-finals of the League Cup, with kickoff slated for 7.45pm BST.
